{'ingredient': 'pork'}.response: {'name': 'Pork Fried Rice', 'ingredients': ['-1/2 cup uncooked white rice', '-1/2 small onion, diced', '-1/4 small green bell pepper, diced', '-1 small carrot, peeled and grated', '-3 tablespoons vegetable oil', '-1/2 teaspoon salt', '-1/4 teaspoon black pepper', '-1/2 pound pork tenderloin, cut into bite-sized pieces', '-3 tablespoons soy sauce', '-3 tablespoons oyster sauce', '-1/4 cup chicken broth', '-1 teaspoon sugar'], 'instructions': ['1. Cook rice according to package instructions.', '2. In a large skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat. Add onion, bell pepper, carrot, salt, and black pepper. Cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.', '3. Add pork, soy sauce, oyster sauce, chicken broth, and sugar. Cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.', '4. Add cooked rice and stir to combine. Cook for 2 minutes, or until heated through.']}
